entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 13.
